nodes.text: Directive 59826, also known as Imperial directive 59826 was an edict issued by Gilad Pellaeon to his forces prior to the Battle of Ithor. It stated that if Pellaeon were to be removed from command of the joint Imperial-New Republic forces around Ithor, then all Imperial ships were to immediately return to Bastion. He issued it primarily to avoid interference by Borsk Fey'lya.
